titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the wage schedules for all prevailing rate employees be adjusted consistently in accordance with public policy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM, DOD.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/15/1988--Introduced. Establishes a uniform method for determining the pay of prevailing rate employees. (Current provisions exclude prevailing rate employees of the Department of Defense.)
